snippet: "Homeland," which stars Claire Danes as a bipolar C.I.A. officer and Damian Lewis as a rescued soldier, and "Dexter," which stars Michael C. Hall as a Miami serial killer of other serial killers, will resume new episodes on Sept. 30.
abstract: "Homeland," which stars Claire Danes as a bipolar C.I.A. officer and Damian Lewis as a rescued soldier, and "Dexter," which stars Michael C. Hall as a Miami serial killer of other serial killers, will resume new episodes on Sept. 30.

headline.main: Showtime Sets Return Dates for 'Homeland' and 'Dexter'
headline.print_headline: Showtime Sets Date For Two Series’ Return
